short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in holiday cheer with a beautifully decorated Christmas tree on your new tab page!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This live wallpaper transforms your browser with a vibrant Christmas tree, adorned with sparkling lights, colorful ornaments, and a shining star on top. Each time you open a new tab, the tree glows softly, creating a warm and festive atmosphere. Snowflakes drift gently across the screen, enhancing the cozy, holiday spirit.

Customize your experience with animations like twinkling lights, falling snow, and calming background music. Whether you're getting into the holiday mood or simply admiring the beauty of the tree, this extension brings Christmas magic to your browsing experience. Let the decorated Christmas tree light up your screen and fill your day with seasonal joy!
